title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 662.2 - Nonregulated investments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 662.2 - Nonregulated investments

State Regulations

Nonregulated investments shall include the investment in
nonregulated activities that are conducted through the same legal entity as the
telephone company operations, but do not involve the joint or common use of
assets or resources in the provision of both regulated and nonregulated
products. (See sections
661.4, 661.14 and
661.16
of this

Title.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
662.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
